comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
Another photo of the Charles G. Gates funeral:

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4526078148/]

Hours before his death, bidding farewell to Buffalo Bill Cody, after a hunting trip in Cody, Wyoming:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4465066630/in/photostream/]

Charles G. Gates photo, with comments about him:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3682650360/in/photostream/]

Gates died on October 28, 1913, of a heart attack, in Cody, Wyoming, where he had been hunting elk with friends, not long after Prince Albert I of Monaco hunted there with Buffalo Bill Cody himself.
